name: Circuit Board
description: A worn but still-functional circuit board found in old vending machines.

name: Neon Sign
description: A brightly lit neon sign. It attracts nearby Critters.

name: Synthetic Fur
description: A clump of artificial fur once used in plush market mascots.

name: Memory Chip
description: An encrypted chip once used in city surveillance drones. Still retains partial memory.

name: Data Crumb
description: A fragmented byte of corrupted code. Often used in underworld data mining.

name: Plastic Filament
description: Cheap, mass-produced 3D printer filament — now repurposed for Critter gear.

name: Drone Rotor
description: The lightweight rotor of a service drone. Spins on residual magnetism.

name: Ad Token
description: A coin-shaped microchip from pre-collapse digital marketplaces. Still displays popups.

name: Urban Moss
description: Bio-luminescent moss that grows in neon-lit alleyways. Common and relatively useful.

name: Broken Stylus
description: Used for touchscreens that haven't worked in years. Mostly intact.

name: Smashed Lens
description: The fractured lens of an old street surveillance camera.

name: Graffiti Chip
description: Encodes visual tags and street murals. Used by rogue Critters to mark territory.

name: Rusty Cog
description: Once part of an elevator mechanism. Grinds when turned, but still useful in urban crafting.

name: Cracked Visor
description: A shattered AR visor from a video game console. Flickers with glitched overlays.

name: Spool of Wire
description: Loose but functional wiring often scavenged from utility poles and old kiosks.

name: LED Fragment
description: A jagged piece of LED signage. Still emits a low pulsing glow in certain conditions.

name: Parking Stub
description: An ancient relic of pre-collapse infrastructure. Some machines still accept it as currency.

name: Plastic Canister
description: A lightweight container used in food delivery drones. Can store liquids such as crafting solvents or fuel.

name: Transit Token
description: Prepaid chip used to access defunct metro systems. Holds a faint charge of magnetic energy.

name: Access Keycard
description: Magnetic ID from a locked-down sector. Could be useful for bypassing digital locks.

name: Fiber Plate
description: A cracked composite plate once used for public infrastructure shielding. Surprisingly durable.

name: LED Filament
description: A soft-glow light coil salvaged from old lamps. Still flickers when agitated with electricity.

name: Car Tire
description: A worn tire from a long-abandoned vehicle. It still holds air.

name: Power Relay
description: Used to distribute energy in high-rise buildings. May still carry a charge.

name: Cracked Lens
description: A lens from an old surveillance bot. Still records, but warps visuals unpredictably.

name: Red Concrete Brick
description: A solid piece of concrete from a collapsed building. Useful for crafting and fortifying.

name: Synthetic Oil
description: Thick lubricant used in old city machinery. Smells faintly of burnt circuits.

name: Recycled Glass
description: Shimmering fragments melted together from old skyscraper windows.

name: Battery Core
description: An empty shell of a city power cell. It is useless on its own, but can be repurposed.

name: Phone Charger
description: A charger from a long-dead smartphone. Still holds a faint charge.

name: Metal Bolt
description: A solid fastener from old city structures. Rust-resistant and perfect for reinforcing gear.

name: Audio Recorder
description: A handheld device that captures ambient sounds. Some recordings contain ghostly murmurs.

name: Metal Coil
description: A humming coil that absorbs static electricity. Useful for powering low-tier machinery.

name: Bent Antenna
description: A twisted communication antenna. Can sometimes still catch old emergency signals.

name: Plastic Bottle
description: A common plastic shard from a broken bottle. Can be melted down for crafting.

name: Cable Bundle
description: A tangled mess of communication cables. Needed for certain advanced Critter accessories.

name: Broken Monitor
description: A cracked display screen from a storefront. May contain hidden circuit boards inside.

name: Flare Gun
description: A flare gun used for emergency signals. Still contains a small amount of flammable gas.

name: Compass
description: A battered but semi-functional compass pointing to cardinal directions.

name: Nano Casing
description: A lightweight casing used in drones. Can be repurposed for Critter armor.

name: Energy Cell
description: A depleted energy cell from a utility drone. Can be recharged for limited use.

name: Rusty Spring
description: A corroded spring salvaged from old machinery. Still has some tension left.

name: Neon Tube
description: A glowing tube from a broken neon sign. Emits a faint hum when touched.

name: Circuit Fuse
description: A small fuse used in electrical panels. Can be repurposed for Critter gadgets.

name: Broken Gear
description: A chipped gear from an industrial machine. Still rotates under pressure.

name: Glass Shard
description: A sharp fragment of glass. Often used in crafting or as a makeshift tool.

name: Metal Scrap
description: A jagged piece of metal from a collapsed structure. Useful for repurposing and crafting.

name: Old Battery
description: A corroded battery that still holds a charge. Can power small devices.

name: Plastic Shard
description: A small piece of broken plastic. Commonly found in urban ruins.

name: Magnet
description: A magnet salvaged from an old speaker. Still retains some magnetic force.

name: Holo Disk
description: A damaged holographic storage disk. Contains fragments of lost data.

name: Mossy Stone
description: A smooth river stone covered in vibrant moss. Radiates a faint warmth.

name: Twilight Sap
description: Collected from ancient trees. Glows faintly under moonlight and smells of forgotten woods.

name: Feather Cluster
description: A tangle of colorful bird feathers. Occasionally twitches with latent wind energy.

name: Bark Shard
description: Tough fragment of bark from a giant old-growth tree. Resistant to decay.

name: Lumina Flower
description: A radiant flower that only blooms during electric storms. Highly sought after for rituals.

name: Thorn Vine
description: A twisting vine lined with razor-sharp thorns. Can be woven into resilient armor.

name: Root Fragment
description: Piece of an underground root system. Still pulses faintly with old earth energy.

name: Pollen Dust
description: Fine golden dust from rare forest flowers. Sparks faint electrical surges when gathered.

name: Hollow Acorn
description: A strange acorn that rattles mysteriously when shaken.

name: Wild Resin
description: Sticky, strong, and resistant to corruption. Used by forest Critters to patch their shells.

name: Spirit Leaf
description: A shimmering leaf rumored to be blessed by the spirits of the deep woods.

name: Snapped Twig
description: A simple broken twig — but some carry traces of powerful latent magic.

name: Amber Core
description: A chunk of crystallized tree sap containing ancient bugs and locked memories.

name: Fungal Cap
description: Part of a massive mushroom colony. Used for crafting organic tech interfaces.

name: Forest Ember
description: A coal fragment from a long-dead wildfire, now infused with dormant wildfire spirits.

name: Shimmer Bark
description: Reflective bark that glows softly at night. Used for cloaking technology.

name: Spiritseed
description: A living seed rumored to contain an entire micro-forest ecosystem inside.

name: Mist Frond
description: A rare fern that thrives only in heavy mist. Its leaves drip with naturally charged water droplets.

name: Burl Nut
description: A hard-shelled nut with swirling wood patterns. Breaks open to reveal nutrient-rich fibers.

name: Vine Creep
description: Living strands of fast-growing vine, twitching gently even after harvest.

name: Shardstone
description: A jagged piece of mountain crystal, sharp enough to slice thin armor.

name: Frost Bloom
description: A delicate flower that only blooms in freezing temperatures.

name: Basalt Core
description: A heavy rock rich with dormant volcanic energy.

name: Cave Pearl
description: A smooth mineral sphere formed in dripping caves over centuries.

name: Slate Fragment
description: Thin and brittle, slate fragments make excellent lightweight armor plates.

name: Wind-Polished Rock
description: A stone smoothed into aerodynamic perfection by mountain gales.

name: Frozen Root
description: Tough, frost-covered roots that survive against impossible odds.

name: Snowcap Moss
description: Moss that clings to icy cliffs, glowing faintly in moonlight.

name: Glacial Dust
description: Finely ground powder from ancient glaciers, infused with primordial energy.

name: Eagle Feather
description: A talisman of sharp sight and free winds, plucked from high-soaring eagles.

name: Thunderstone
description: A rare rock that vibrates with static, rumored to have absorbed lightning strikes.

name: Broken Pickaxe
description: A shattered mining tool, its handle worn smooth by harsh winters.

name: Cavern Echo
description: A mysterious rock that hums softly when touched, mimicking lost sounds.

name: Icicle Fang
description: A long, dagger-like shard of ice, unnaturally durable against heat.

name: Granite Core
description: Dense, nearly indestructible rock at the heart of collapsed mountain caverns.

name: Cloudstone
description: A rare, porous stone that floats for a few moments when thrown.

name: Stalactite Chip
description: A sharp fragment from a collapsed cave ceiling.

name: Echo Mushroom
description: A fungi species that thrives on sound vibrations deep underground.

name: Whisper Vine
description: Delicate vines that sway to unseen breezes even in still air.

name: Bitter Frostleaf
description: A harsh-tasting herb used by ancient mountaineers to resist freezing winds.

name: Sun-Scorched Shard
description: A brittle piece of stone superheated by endless sun exposure.

name: Cactus Spine
description: A long, barbed thorn from a desert giant cactus. Tough and venomous.

name: Dune Pearl
description: Formed under tons of shifting sand, these rare pearls shimmer like stars.

name: Salt Crystal
description: Harvested from ancient dried lakes, these crystals are dense with energy.

name: Scorpid Tail
description: The venomous tail of a desert scorpion, still twitching slightly after severance.

name: Wind Glass
description: Glass formed naturally from sand by desert lightning storms.

name: Drybone Fragment
description: Brittle bones of long-dead creatures bleached under desert suns.

name: Sundried Husk
description: Hollow remains of desert flora, rattling eerily when carried.

name: Mirage Dust
description: Fine, shimmering dust that bends light and confuses trackers.

name: Tumblevine
description: A hardy vine that rolls across deserts on unpredictable winds.

name: Cracked Medallion
description: An ancient artifact buried under sands, etched with lost runes.

name: Sandstone Brick
description: A building fragment from a lost desert civilization.

name: Ash Cactus Fruit
description: A rare edible cactus fruit, blackened by desert fires but nutrient-rich.

name: Scaldroot
description: A desert root that radiates intense heat when unearthed.

name: Blisterweed
description: A desert herb whose oils can both heal and poison, depending on use.

name: Vulture Feather
description: A scavenger's trophy, said to grant persistence under harsh skies.

name: Sandglass Core
description: The crystallized heart of a collapsed sandstorm, humming with latent power.

name: Obsidian Fang
description: A razor-sharp volcanic shard, once part of a desert predator's weaponry.

name: Sandsifter Beetle Shell
description: The armored shell of a beetle adapted to burrowing through dunes.

name: Wanderer's Map
description: A timeworn cloth map said to point to a hidden oasis and caches full of riches.
